article.title: Waff Assigned to G-1, U.S. Army

tags.tag: U.S. Army Deputy Chief of Staff G-1

article.text: Maj. Gen. William D. R. Waff, USAR, has been assigned as assistant deputy chief of staff, G-1 (individual mobilization augmentee), office of the deputy chief of staff, G-1, U.S. Army, Washington, D.C.
